name: Blood Exile
description:
Blood Exile is an arcade top down shooter with elements of procedural generation. Immerse yourself in the ancient world of magic, protecting it from the invasion of the undead. Blood Exile is an arcade top down shooter with elements of procedural generation. Immerse yourself in the ancient world of magic, protecting it from the invasion of the undead.

In Blood Exile, you have to survive 30 difficult days, fighting off the monsters that come at you. Potions and your trusty staff will help you on this difficult path.

Features: Procedurally generated world, Crowds of different enemies, Day and night cycle, Fun action packed gameplay, have fun!
